summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated December 15, 2009. The email discusses confidential information and emphasizes the attorney-client privilege associated with the communication. It also includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure of the information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a need for confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which discusses confidential matters.

Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email's content is prohibited.
